website_summaries.verdict: Nipple concealer pasties that are soft and flexible.
pros: Made from hypoallergenic, medical grade silicone
Soft and flexible, adding curves without bulk
Very thin, tapered edges for smoothness
Adhesive designed to stick to pasties, not skin
Available in two versions, two sizes, and three skin tones
cons: Slightly over 10% of purchasers had adverse reactions to the adhesive cream or found the covers not staying in place

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: You know when your life gets better after you purchase a specific product? Well this is that product. With this Texas summer weather approaching, wearing a bra is like sticking your breasts in a straight jacket! I slapped these bad boys on today and went braless in a white tank top! I'm a happy woman!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peeling off itself
customer_reviews.text: I bought it twice. The first pair from last year was so great that i bought again. But this time is terrible. It is peeling off by itself, see picture and sticks to your skin too tight and hurts to get it off. Also no air gets in so you will have sweat in the cup. So sad the quality went so bad this year. I really liked the first one bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Sweat-proof, Sensitivity-safe, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These feel like my skin. I got the darkest shade (co. should have more shades). Nipples did not show under white tees. I accidentally washed these in the washing machine and the adhesive wasn’t affected at all. Will forever use these. They’re comfortable and do not budge when I sweat in the hot sun. I also have the most sensitive skin in the world. Best nippies on the market. 36B and got the smallest size (the L was much too big).
customer_reviews.author: Aussieson

customer_reviews.title: I have two nipples, I only received one....
customer_reviews.text: I only received one. I like most women have two nipples
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Bristols6 Version!
customer_reviews.text: I'm mainly writing this review to let people know that there are 2 sellers on Amazon, under this listing. I've seen a lot of negative reviews due to people buying the automatically defaulted seller (NOT Bristols6) and getting some knockoff products. I bought the product from Amazon, from Bristols6 (had to look to the left where Amazon lists other sellers) and I got exactly what was pictured and they work exponentially well...They also shipped from California. They are extremely comfortable and you don't even feel them, I'll definitely be buying these again when the adhesives wear off. :)
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Dancer Approved
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure; I'm not a woman and do not wear these. That being said, I asked my daughter, who does wear these, for her thoughts. She is a competitive dancer and wears these under costumes. She wears them all day and under unusual conditions. Dancing, multiple costume changes and sweating. She says they have a strong, but not irritating sticking power. They do not shift out of place after many hours of wear and body movement. They are not affected by sweating. She admitted to wearing them off stage as well because they are more comfortable than a bra.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Megaro

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried probably at least 6 different brands of petals, and these are the holy grail. They’re just the right thickness- they’re almost vaguely see-through when they’re on, but enough to totally smooth things out without being visible under a tight, white top (i.e. no ridge around the edges). The best part though is they’re soft(?) enough that they really shape to your body. Other petals I’ve tried seemed like you needed to be shaped *just so* for them to look natural under a shirt. These are flexible enough that it actually cupped me instead of looking like I was wearing half a plastic easter egg on top of my chest lol.
customer_reviews.author: SomethingAwesome

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd pair. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these in the past and the quality was a lot better. My last pairs lasted for almost 2 years! I don’t know what happened with this company’s quality standards, but when they arrived there was extra rippled edges with no adhesive...they also replaced the hard plastic to store the pieces on with a soft plastic (think plastic bag material). I’ve worn them once now and I can already tell they won’t last half as long as my last pair.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This item covers the entire nipple perfectly. It is very soft and comfortable enough for all day wear. The only time the edge of the nipple cover become slightly visible was when wearing shirts too tight or while wearing form fitting shirts while bending in ways that pressed the side of the breast around the nipple cover (which took effort to make happen). Easily washable and reusable. The price is worth every penny. I’m a 36b.
customer_reviews.author: Bissy&Bram

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Will definetly recomend!
customer_reviews.text: These nipple covers are amazing! After reading many reviews on adhesive bras and nippier covers I decided to go with this one. I’m glad I did! I tested tested it out by doing some HIIT workouts to see if it could hold up under a lot of sweat. After my workout they hadn’t budged. I felt confident and secure while dancing at a friends wedding a few days later. This was a great purchase and I would definetly recommend to anyone looking to have something with long lasting adhesion that holds up well under sweaty conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Eckles

customer_reviews.title: Get over the price
customer_reviews.text: I tried six yes six other brands. I wanted to save money and well isn’t all silicone the same? What I found is that the initial cost of this brand may be higher but it more than covers the cost of buying multiple cheaper pairs that don’t last beyond three uses. Their product is excellent. It is sturdy and supple and adheres perfectly at the edges after being used and washed multiple times. I have been braless for 50 years and now I can be braless forever.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Lost one on the first use, adhesive could be better
customer_reviews.text: I wore these out on a regular day that wasn’t even too hot and somehow lost one! I don’t know how that happened, I only walked around - no strenuous activity. It was the first time i wore them too, so i feel like i didn’t get to use them much. It’s too bad they don’t come more to one pack. Can’t really justify spending another 25 dollars on a new pair now. But if they work for you, more power to you!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pasties!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these pasties now for a few years and they are best ones I have ever used. The adhesive is amazing and lasts for a really long time. The edges gradually taper off, making them invisible underneath your clothing, rather than giving the appearance of a larger nipple. Unlike other pasties that I have tried, they material doesn’t curl over or wrinkle on the edges over time. They are also very comfortable, I can’t even tell I’m wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product thanks to Jean Wang (Extra Petite). I've worn these with shirts, dresses, etc. and cannot complain! It's very comfortable and light! I recommend getting a darker shade since the color of your nipples can come through the pads. The maintenance is easy enough: wash with a little bit of soap and water and let air dry overnight. I definitely recommend getting this if you are looking for a comfortable nipple covers :)
customer_reviews.author: Dasom Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sanitary, reusable, and great adherence
customer_reviews.text: This covers more than enough surface area to give discrete, natural, and smooth coverage. It is perfectly sticky so I have never worried about the endurance throughout the day. It lays perfectly over the curves so there is no issue with clothes snagging it off. It is also super easy to clean: just rinse it and let it air dry. The packaging was great too. It comes layered between plastic and wax paper within a plastic satchel, all tucked inside a small compact box. This makes the kit great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: ttc

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a braless yet "smooth" appearance
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these, as I hate wearing bras but also hate "headlights" lol. If you wear them every day and take care when washing them, they will last about a month before the adhesive starts peeling off or clumping up like pilling on a sweater. They will still work at that point, but might not stay on as securely. At that point, if you are wearing them under something relatively tight fitting, they will stay put; if you are wearing them under a loose top, they won't fall off, but parts (maybe a third of the circumference) might pull away from your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Coreen Montagna

customer_reviews.title: I like these, and they have held up pretty well ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these, and they have held up pretty well after 6 months. I use them an average of once a week. They're still sticky, and do what they're supposed to. They cover nips well. But, they sometimes start to peel on the sticky side and some stuff sticks to my boobs when I take them off. I sometimes wear them for the whole day, so that may be a part of it. I wash them with soap and water after every use, so I'm a little surprised/disappointed. But overall, they're nice. I may try a different brand after these are done.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: The best pasty. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! These do not show through your clothing, your clothing does not cling to the material of the pasties and there is no rippling. They are really easy to clean and reuse. I wore them all summer long! Make sure you have clean, dry skin before applying because the adhesive will not stick and you will NOT love! These stay put through everything and I will never repurchase a disposable pasty again. They also come in a cute box to store!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this product for a day so I will try to update my review later on as well. But so far I absolutely love them! I have been wanting to go bra-less for a long time and these make it possible for me to do so and feel comfortable/confident. Good adhesion to my skin. Very easy to use and take off. I have read from other users a pair can last a few months. I’ll likely be doing a subscription for these if they continue to work well for me over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: They came used
customer_reviews.text: Took them out of the box and found them worn and covered in hair and fuzz. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: J. Volk

customer_reviews.title: CANT LIVE WITHOUT THESE
customer_reviews.text: Best ever!! If you wear clothes.... YOU NEED THESE I love these! I’ve been wearing breast petals since they came out a few decades ago, and I had one pair for literally 20 years which I’ve now retired I’ve tried soooo many types of these and these ARE THE BEST! A bit larger, more tapered and perfect color and matte texture so it doesn’t look shiny under sheer apparel They stay on very well
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua mama

customer_reviews.title: Love my Nippies!
customer_reviews.text: These are a game changer for me!!! I hate wearing a bra, and my girls love being free! But I’m not totally comfortable with letting them be too “obvious” in public. I don’t think I’ve put a bra on since I got my Nippies a few weeks ago! It’s great! As long as you take good care of them (wash and rinse well after each use, let air dry, adhere original backings and “rest” in hard plastic protectors that they came in), they seem to stay like new. Just follow instructions for wearing.
customer_reviews.author: darylann

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to friends and would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Pro’s: - sticky, but not too sticky - completely cover my areola (dark circle around the nipples) - I wore longer than recommended, but they stayed on in this heat and humidity of Texas. (At one point, it did feel like my nipples felt like they were needing air, so make sure to not wear them too long.) Worth every penny. No problems that I read about with other sticky nipple covers. Take care of them, and I feel like they will last a while. I LOVE feeling free of my bras, but not worried about people staring at my nipples ;-)
customer_reviews.author: LDS Adventures

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Solid product. 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wedding and gave them a test run. Since then, I have reused them at least 6 times (and counting). This includes walking around the city all day in August heat. They definitely collected sweat but didn’t slide or peel off. They clean easy and stay sticky! Just make sure you keep the plastic backing and seal them well between use. Great packaging helps them keep their shape. Great color match for me, invisible under a lightweight cream cami. Anymore I opt to wear these instead of a bra whenever I can. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the 18$ version its not the Authentic version.
customer_reviews.text: I love Nippies Skin been using them for years, but I was fooled by the cheaper price and ordered the Nippes skin Adhesive creme for $18. I noticed it shipped from CHINA when I received. I come to find out its a totally different product, it’s a small/thick cheap silicon nipple cover and not the Nippies Skins from Bristols Six as promised.. Buyers be Aware don't go for the cheaper version on this listing/ anything shipping from CHINA option.
customer_reviews.author: Jose88

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bras
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing I’m never wearing a bra again. They’re so much more comfortable and stayed on even though I wore them all day outside in the summer while sweating. I used them multiple days in a row and washed them after each use and they haven’t lost their stickiness. Someone said buy the darker version if you have light skin but a darker nipple. I bought the one that matched my skin tone and the nip-area didn’t show through my shirt. I could sort of see it through the cover, but definitely not through the shirt. The covers didn’t show either and they’re round so it looks like you’re wearing a bra.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Best Nipple Covers I’ve Purchased, but....
customer_reviews.text: These are the best nipple covers I’ve ever purchased! They are comfortable, and thin enough that they’re not noticeably bulky or weirdly shaped while wearing. However, be cautious when it comes to ordering this color... My nipples are just slightly darker than my skin tone which is very fair, and they’re slightly peeking through. I thought I would be fine based on the product description because of my coloring, but that’s not the case. Thankfully I’m not planning to wear these with any sheer fabric so I’m fine, but I definitely wouldn’t feel comfortable wearing these if that were the case. Keep that in mind while ordering. Other than that, these are amazing. :)
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky at all after only 2 1/2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Not at all sticky now after only 2 1/2 months of use. I have followed all instructions, only wear about 3-4 x week. Very disappointed. How is it that some people have theses for years? Wondering if I received a defective item
customer_reviews.author: OYG

customer_reviews.title: I love these nippies
customer_reviews.text: I love these nippies!! First off, my nipples are kind of dark, and these allow me to wear tank tops without having a bulky bra underneath and those tank tops that are tight. My nipples don't show through the shirt which is sooo great! Also, perfect for any backless dresses, tanks, and other tops. Don't even bother with those chicken cutlets (stick on bras) because sometimes they wont fit your breast shape, but these are great because your breast shape is very natural and it wont create any extra lines, all while covering your nipples!!
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love them but...
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful for these and for the first 2 weeks I wore them almost every day and loved them. However, I have now had them for 3 weeks and they are not staying on properly. The sticky only truly remains right around a tight circle in the middle of the cup and they constantly are pulling away from my boobs. I really wanted to love these but not an every day wear thing. Edit - I contacted the seller and because I didn’t get the minimum 20-30wears they sent me replacements. I’m hopeful I just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Callicott

customer_reviews.title: Seriously amazing
customer_reviews.text: These were some of the best things I ever bought.. so comfy, hides your 'nippies' perfectly, no visible ridges under clothes.. so comfy I've accidentally gone to bed with them on a couple of times! They do have a hard time staying on if it's too hot (it does get sweaty underneath, sorry, it's gross, but true) but they can (and should!) be rinsed every once in a while without losing their stickiness, which is nice. I was nervous that the listing wasn't letting me pick a color, but I received a perfect medium nude. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty life changing... I haven't worn a bra in weeks and it's so freeing! I can't wear these with some tops unfortunately because you can see the outline, but that's usually in sheer/see through tops. So far I haven't had any issues with the adhesive. Still just as sticky as day 1. I wash them after each use in soap and water. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: drm012

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but see-through
customer_reviews.text: So, this is an amazing product. Its definitely the best pasty I’ve ever used and it’s because it doesn't show at all through the shirt. The only reason i’m knocking a star off is because you can still see the color of my nipple through the pasty because it’s slightly transparent. So, if i’m wearing a see-through shirt you can still see the color of my nipple. For everything else though, it’s absolutely amazing. I have this silk shirt that should be worn without a bra but i hate how pointy my little boobs are lol and this smooths them out perfectly. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best! I have boobs that do not like bras. They just get shaped weird and don’t look natural at all. I’ve always preferred the more natural look and unfortunately it doesn’t always go well at family functions, work outings etc. These things have been a lifesaver. I’ve worn them everyday for two weeks now and I will be buying more! The adhesive has yet to show any wear or tear and I simply wash them with soap and water at night and let them air dry. I can see how wearing them every day may wear them down a bit, but for the price and convenience, they’re worth more than gold to me!
customer_reviews.author: Cali B.

customer_reviews.title: Bra-be-gone
customer_reviews.text: There are so many outfits I like to wear that a bras are too noticeable under. And due to breast-feeding, my breasts don’t align evenly anymore and going bra-less sometimes looks like you’re winking at the person in front of you. These cover me perfectly and I have forgotten that I went braless many times. And the ease of pulling off ,storing and putting them back In the case is easy and helps retain they are Shay. They are sticky no matter how many times you have use them and put them back in the case. .They never fall off
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: I never wear a bra, these are lifesavers
customer_reviews.text: If youre like me and liberated yourself from bras but still have a hefty amount of boobage, these things are great for covering those nips and giving shape to your jugs under tops so that you don't look like lazy trailer trash. These are good for loose tops, I like the non-adhesive ones for tight tops.
customer_reviews.author: Ida

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these kind of frequently for a couple weeks now. They adhere very well, and I don't even feel them throughout the day. I'm an A-cup, and they fit perfectly. They don't show through shirts or leave weird outlines. They're also very easy to clean with soap and water -- especially if you've had a particularly sweaty day. There are little plastics in the container they come in for you to place them on when not in use, and honestly the packaging was of very nice quality. Love love love these. They don't seem to be losing their stick, and I've been wearing them a lot. :)
customer_reviews.author: Haley Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I've used them about 20 times over 6 weeks for 2-8 hours each time, through a variety of activities and activity levels, have washed them several times and they are still going strong! If you follow directions for wearing and washing them you should be happy with them too. Definitely will purchase more in the future. Thank you for a great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints Here!
customer_reviews.text: Used them several times for strapless dresses, sometimes for several hours at a time. No reactions, they hold on tight, and I can reuse them. They also do a good job of covering up the variance in my skin tone. Will totally be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these over and over and they are awesome! The coverage is amazing and they are comfortable as far as wearing them goes. Strapless bras are the worst and so uncomfortable so these have really been a blessing. The only reason I didn't rate these 5 star is because these are NOT so pleasant to take off, which isn’t a huge deal. Although I guess it’s a good thing that they are so sticky because of all of the uses I have gotten out of them, just remove them slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this exact brand before but through Bloomingdales (I think?) and the quality is fantastic. I have bought some cheap Chinese knockoffs but these will hold up for multiple, wears. Like months and months. I usually will use these during the summer time a lot or dresses. Just make sure to clean them. Eventually they won’t stick as easily but I’ll wear a tank top for the support it needs once it gets to that point. I’m not the best at cleaning these as consistent as I should but it’s okay. No lines if you’re concerned about it showing. And solid flesh color. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Not for small-breasted women.
customer_reviews.text: Not for small-breasted women. I needed this for a dress that I couldn't wear a bra with but the material was too thin to go bare (hello headlights). I wasn't blessed with a full chest (sitting at 32A) and this thing could've been an entire second boob on me. It was the size of my palm and very thick so it would be a very obvious attachment and not concealed like I wanted. I couldn't use them and went with a different dress.
customer_reviews.author: A. drake

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and sticks wonderfully. You can use them over and over
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and sticks wonderfully. You can use them over and over. The only thing is my skin gets irritated and even a day or two after Ive removed them, I have red blotches. They don't itch while on and I forget I'm wearing them unlike other brands! So be careful with how long you keep them on if you're sensitive like me, but overall, great deal!! I will probably be repurchasing in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zina

customer_reviews.title: excellent color and nipple coverage.
customer_reviews.text: love these. wear them 5 times a week and in the pool. been a month and still sticking! great under 99 % of fabrics even white silk. yayYayayayay!
customer_reviews.author: littledog

customer_reviews.title: the BEST sticky boobs/nipple covers
customer_reviews.text: I've tried over 20 different nipple covers and this brand is by FAR the best one. It stays on for however long you need it to (I think I've gone over 24 hours from nights out drinking *no shame*). Weathers through sweat, tears, all that good stuff. Also, even if you wear thin clothes you can't see the outline of the covers. 100% would recommend. This is my second pair, I haven't tried them yet but I'm 99% sure they'll be great. Will update when I finally wear them this summer!
customer_reviews.author: ec

customer_reviews.title: Got almost 2 months of consistent wear
customer_reviews.text: First off, I want to say I do love these. They are so comfortable that they're all I want to wear now. The quality of the silicone and the adhesive are both good, the edges are nearly unnoticeable, and my nips have never shown thru them. My only complaint is that the adhesive doesn't last as long as I thought it would based on other reviews. I've worn these almost daily for about 7 weeks and they're almost to the point of not staying on. I'm not keen on the idea of buying a new pair every 2 months, but it's a good product nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: A N Onymous

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn dope
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when I cut down in weight for a bodybuilding show and had like, no boobs haha and got tired of wearing sports bras. Used them all summer and they're still kicking! Your nips do get sweaty underneath as they don't breathe, which eventually leads to a bit of a seam lift but I've never felt I had to just remove them. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: partyparty

customer_reviews.title: Does not adhere for long
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these and based on reviews compared to other products, they seemed like *the* ones. I wish I would have seen reviews about adhesion though so hopefully this will help someone else! After two wears, I was not impressed. Even though I adhered them to completely dry skin, they kept slipping off. It is summer, but isn’t this the time to wear them?! I was wearing a dress on my third wear, and one completely slipped off and is lost, while the other slipped off and was on my kitchen floor. For the money they are NOT worth it. A waste. I’d rather buy one time wears for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed with the quality of these. I have a few dresses where wearing a bra is really a nuisance, and I happened to be wearing one of them when these arrived. Immediately I switched out my bra for the nippies and it made such a difference. You really can’t see them through clothes at all, and they’re so comfortable that I forgot I was wearing them. I really like that they come with a box and plastic dividers that make storage easy. I’m excited to see how these continue to perform, and I think I would totally buy another set once the sticky on these runs out.
customer_reviews.author: abbythestabby

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE. I honestly think every girl needs a pair of these. I use these whenever I'm wearing anything that is backless or has a halter neck or just anything where I don't want the outline of my bra to show. They're super easy to use, don't fall off, and super easy to wash afterwards. I wash them with warm soapy water and allow them to air dry overnight. The next morning, they're just as sticky as they were before and I put them back in their original packaging. I've probably used them about 15-20 times now in the past year and they're still as great as they were in the beginning. Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pang

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I wear these almost every day, as I do not like wearing a bra but have very reactive nipples lol. Within about 30 uses, the silicone adhesive around the edges started to fail, as is noted on the packaging. I bought JOMI roll on body adhesive and it works so well! I will definitely buy these covers again when they completely fail as they are so comfortable, easy to use and function perfectly and for maybe half the price of a decent bra that I don't really want anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Best Nipple Covers in the Game
customer_reviews.text: Burn your bras ladies b/c these are the nipple covers to end all nipple covers. They are comfortable, they don't sweat off and they are reusable. I wear mine daily for at least a month before I buy new ones.... and you could go longer if you wanted too. I live in Texas and these babies will hold up through 100+ temperatures. I have sweated off many an inferior nipple cover in my day and I will tell you these WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these once before but due to losing them I just reordered them... these are hand down the best pasties in the market. I made the mistake of buying a pair of $7 stick ons from Walmart that wouldn’t even stick to my skin, they basically fell off right away upon application.. The price of these nippies cannot be beat! I know these will last me a very very long time... these are perfect for work as I am trying to be as comfortable as possible.. These do the trick..
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Fly high freebird
customer_reviews.text: Love this ingenious product. To think of all the times I went braless while self-conscious. It's a confidence booster knowing the essentials are now covered. Just wished Nippies came in more variety of sizes, as I wish they were a touch smaller. Regardless, if you're thinking of purchasing just do it, you can't even feel them and they are really a great value.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love in a moderate climate and they were worn in ...
customer_reviews.text: So I ordering another pair of these today. These lasted me 10 months, with fairly infrequent use overall. I love in a moderate climate and they were worn in warm weather. If you live in a really warm place, such as Florida, or if you're frequently wearing tops that necessitate these you may end up replacing these two or three times a year. Mine finally lost their stick and fall off of my breasts when I wear them. Time for a new pair! Keep the plastic discs and the box to keep your nippies in and wash after each use. Expect some sweating and slight pruning if you wear these in the heat for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: In-the-anomaly

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: By far one my of favorite purchases. Makes getting dressed super easy. I've had these for a few months now and they are still super sticky and work really well. Just make sure to put them back in their box with the plastic cover after each use to maintain the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rees Family

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN the best purchase I have ever made on Amazon! These things stick like NO OTHER! I think they might work better for gals with a little smaller boobs (I’m a small C cup - itty bitty titty committee amiright ladies)! But I wear them all the time and feel like I’m not wearing a bra! I have WORKED OUT with them on (on accident) and they don’t budge. The only reason I usually didn’t go bra-less before this is because I nip SO BAD! And these things fix that problem and also weirdly somehow keep my tits from bouncing around. It’s incredible! HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: SEAMLESS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in May 2018, and it’s May 2019 now. I’ve used it quite often, maybe once every month or so, and it is still holding up really well!! I have not used it when going outdoors in the heat, so I’m not sure how it would hold up if you were to sweat. That’s why I am buying a backup today for my upcoming trip. I highly recommend this! I love that the circle is bigger than the regular nipple pasties. The regular/smaller ones always make me look like I have big nipples under my shirt, but since these are big, they cover a larger area which makes everything look seamless.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cao

customer_reviews.title: best nipple patch
customer_reviews.text: Best nipple patch pros -reuseable (after washing, it works the same as before washing) -lightweight -hold a long time (I have used it almost 12hours) -handy ( the case is very useful) -sticky ( I used it during rock climbing, it works) cons -no cons
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ever wondered how bad a human nipple can smell?
customer_reviews.text: You're probably thinking -- "my nipples don't smell! I take a shower every day!" Well trust me, you ain't smelled nothing yet. After wearing these bad boys for an 8 hour work shift, make sure you're alone when you remove them, because my god the stench! To be fair though, they are a good product. Comfortable and very adhesive. I will continue to wear them with the expectation that I will have to shower afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Best Pasties on the market! Works great if you have piercings!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various other pasties out there, and these are by far the superior type. I've even forgot I had them on at times. I have nipple piercings and was worried they would be uncomfortable, and I was wrong. They didn't pull or tug on the ring. They made it all very seamless and made me feel secure. I use them mainly for shirts and tops that can be sheer, see through or have lace. I use them when wearing a normal bra would be too obvious. They last all day, and long nights. They've stayed on through hot and sweaty days. Application and removal is very easy, the box they come in is great for helping their longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Fischer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COVERUP NIPPIES!
customer_reviews.text: WOW. These are probably one of the best nipple stickers I have ever purchased (and trust me, I've purchased nipple stickers multiple times). They adhere well onto the skin and have a smooth, finishing texture to it (therefore, no one can tell you are wearing nipple stickers!) I also noticed they don't get dirty. A tip is to always put it on clean skin, and when you are done wearing them, place them back how you originally received them (this way, no dust or disgusting things can get on them). Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, you can see right through them!
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I could wear a nice white tank without a bra and not show nipples but when I put these on, it was clear you could see right through. I don’t know how other women don’t have this problem. It didn’t solve my problem of showing nipples. So what is the point of even having them?
customer_reviews.author: Aariela

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these.  Perfect fit.  Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I can't wear a bra right now, because I am pregnant and tight clothing makes me sick. I also wear these under dresses with open backs. These are wonderful! They stick well, they are seamless, comfortable (can't even tell I'm wearing them), and you can never see my nips even when I'm freezing! I will buy another pair when these wear out, but so far, they have held through many uses and washings. (This is the wife writing the review).
customer_reviews.author: J. Bone

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well
customer_reviews.text: (I ordered the small adhesive covers) Worked perfectly for my bridesmaid dress. There was no way to wear a bra with the dress and the fabric was a thin material so nip coverage was a must! I’m a member of the IBTC and the small had plenty of coverage. They were super easy to apply, stayed put 100% for over 8 hrs and were easy to take off and put away for another use. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Penland

customer_reviews.title: No show!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried these in the past (different brand) and they showed through tight shirts. These don't!! I am smaller chested, and the previous brands I tried just made me look like I had huge areolas (hahaha). These are PERFECT!! They don't show through even the tightest shirt and they are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jamster

customer_reviews.title: The glue does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product last year and it worked very well. So I bought it this year. I have to say it is terrible. I think maybe the glue is different because it cannot stick on my skin. It keeps dropping out and I have to go to restroom to fix them every few minutes. Too embarrassing. Won’t buy it again. Super disappointed this year.(BTW, I just wear it once this year, but last year I wore for around 3 months)
customer_reviews.author: YILI ZHOU

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Coverage - Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t bought anything like this before so I was a little hesitant spending $25 on one pair, but I am super happy with this purchase. I ordered the smaller size and am a 32DD. They went on real easy, there were no lines in my shirt, and I could even tell I was wearing them the whole time. It’s super cool how you can just wash them with soap and warm water and then after they dry they are just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Lyke

customer_reviews.title: Safe and great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have gone braless since the pandemic started and just found this great product. It is lightweight, full coverage, full adhesive and easy to clean. It doesnt hurt my nips when I peel it off and doesnt cause any rash. Also, when I put it on, i cant really tell that i have my nips covered. It feels barely there which is what I love about it. Very happy with this product and I will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: msmaganda19

customer_reviews.title: Excellent accessory for slinky outfits
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a dance instructor and often wears outfits for both teaching and performing that expose more of her than she would like, especially in colder environments. She's worn these for years, and loves them. They are easy to apply, stay in place, are comfortable and easy to clean. They also will last for years. She's now got several sets to go in the dresser at home, in her dance bag etc.
customer_reviews.author: Faramir66103

customer_reviews.title: Irritated bumpy red skin after use
customer_reviews.text: I got these because of all the good reviews and wore them once for a night and then again for a whole day and the entire area around my nipple is now irritated, red and bumpy. I don’t have sensitive skin whatsoever so this was a big shock to me. I read reviews that the formula has been recently changed so that might be why there were tons of good reviews but I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BB Simon

customer_reviews.title: Only One Gripe
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've ever bought. Although sweat makes these things lode their stick, I can usually wear them for at least 8 hours before they start falling off. The adhesive has lasted months with close daily use and it is only now starting to peel. One gripe I have is that there is no place for the nipples and, with close to daily use, they grow sore from the adhesive being put on and pulled off constantly. A good fix for this that I've found is to put some lotion on the sensitive parts so the adhesive won't stick to them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Paskevicius

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear the cheaper nipple covers, but then decided to splurge and try the Nippies. They're definitely a lot better at being invisible, and stick much better too. I admit I haven't worn a bra since I started using these.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: You guys........these things are AWESOME! I bought my skin nipples over TWO YEARS ago and they are still going strong! I think I've worn them between 10-15 times now, and the adhesive is still in great shape. I've also worn them in the heat at a wedding, and they did not become less effective with sweating. They are incredibly comfortable as well. Probably one of the best items I have bought off of Amazon, and I will buy them again when the time comes. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: The G.O.A.T. sticky bra solution !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I've used tons of cheap knock offs of these and other types of sticky bras over the years and thought they were good until I got these- the way these taper at the edges and stick SO well it's like it's part of you and I often forget I even have them on. Lines dont show even through white tanks and last hours & hours. To be fair, i've yet to use them in a setting where I would be sweaty like in a club or out in summer so I'll be interested to see if they lose their stickiness then. But so far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Glynnann Aumiller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful..but so easy to lose!!!  😭😭
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I have made in years! Total freedom ladies!! Looks great! They also adhere really well......even if you sweat. My warning....put them somewhere safe! LOL I placed mine on sink in bathroom and forgot to take them out. Went back and their gone!! Who knows what they stuck too and left with. Been a week and nowhere to be found. I am devastated....truly. They need a model with GPS!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smith-Knight

customer_reviews.title: Freedom!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these in the mail and wore them today. I really like the nippies! They are soft and lay flat to the skin with a nice amount of stick. I wore them for about 5-6 hours and it felt like I was wearing nothing at all! The freedom of that is wonderful. Never having to whip off a bra again! Thank you Covid for this.... Wasn't wearing a bra at home and hated to put one back on. I wish I looked into this years ago! Bonus: bf loves it too! Size A cup and bye bye bras. Will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the boob help I needed...
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, these are a little strange. Makes me look nipple-less and they are semi-hard, so it felt weird every time I brushed my boob. I wore with a backless summer dress to a wedding and they worked! It was strange at first being “floppy” but it was so hot after 30 mins or so I didn’t care. Which FYI they held up extremely well in heat and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Never wearing a bra again!
customer_reviews.text: Came across these totally by accident and I’m glad I did! I hate wearing a bra, and even a bralette is very uncomfortable to me. So I figured I would try these out and I’m never going back! I’m a large C and ordered the light color A-D cup and they fit great. They don’t give you any lift or support, but completely hide your nips. No one will be asking you Is it cold in here?? I’ve been wearing them everyday for 3 weeks. Honestly best purchase I’ve made in a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Simplicity

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever live without these
customer_reviews.text: I've had these a couple of months and have worn them regularly. They are lightweight and I forget I'm wearing them. So far with washing them with soap every few uses they still stick perfectly. Whenever these are no longer functional I will no doubt buy them again. They are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: GREAT covers - choose color carefully
customer_reviews.text: These are great nipple covers. They stay on well (you are only supposed to wear them for 4-6 hours), and are completely invisible without showing around the edges of it, even thin fabric. I ordered the light color since I am fair-skinned but beware the light color will not cover the darker shade of your nipples under white fabrics!! Best to choose a shade closer to your nipple color if you are planning to wear light colored clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: buy it! worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I only tested it once wearing it for 2-3hours and the adhesive makes sure theu stay on. They do not smell as well. Came well packaged in seal tight plastic bag so I knew it was not mishandle or used. I think if you are a C cup or bigger it is best to get the bigger size and not the small size. Easy to take off, did not tug or rip skin off, did not leave and residue as well.
customer_reviews.author: ...no name...

customer_reviews.title: Best way to go braless with class
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a way to go braless and still be decent while at work, and this is the solution! I wear these all day at work and they have yet to show under anything that isn't super thin or light colored. Adhesive stays very well, no skin irritation, and as long as I wash them with soap and water and leave out overnight to air dry they are good to go for the next day. Highly recommend! Will be buying at least one more set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!! Hardly know they are on aside from no nipple show. I find bras so uncomfortable and like to go bra less. The adhesive is trustworthy and they lay flat against skin. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Infante

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different brands of these adhesive nipple covers, but these are far superior than the other ones I have tried. Finally nipple covers that don’t look like I have large swollen areolas. I have worn under dresses, in place of pads in bathing suits (yes, they stay in place!), and under bralettes that have no padding. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just received product and only work once but it stuck well all day and molded to my body nicely. Used this with a spaghetti strap dress so I wouldn’t have to wear a bra. Very soft material and couldn’t even tell I had it on! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Team TCK

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. Bought it in February for a winter vacation with family where I didn't want to worry about nipples being visible. Works like a charm, so comfortable I have forgotten I had them on more than once after changing out of clothes and putting on jammies. I have implants under the muscle and don't really need a bra so these are a godsend when I work as well so I still look 'together' but am very comfortable! Haven't washed them yet, they've really retained stickiness. Not painful at all removing.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than I expected! I bought them to wear with my wedding dress, but ended up wearing them all day today under a sundress. I was incredibly impressed with how well they stayed on, despite wearing loose fabric and it being an 86 degree day. I forgot I was even wearing them! I also like that the surface area is bigger. It makes them less puffy and noticeable. In case it’s helpful to know, I’m a 32C, so not small or large chested per se.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. It covers well, securely, and discretely. No lines no bulges. I subtracted a star because I don't care for the box they're stored in nor the individual protectors. It is too cumbersome to try to lay each silicone disc exactly centered over the slightly undersized protective disc. And the cute little black box holds those discs so exactly that I have to turn it upside down and dump them out on the counter. Please! Just provide a plastic slab with two rounded humps and call it done!
customer_reviews.author: Tompattyt

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky.
customer_reviews.text: These serve the purpose but I wish they weren’t self sticking. The adhesive is too sticky and hurts when removing them. Also a pain to store. I prfer dmers myself. Non adhesive, just pop in your bra and forget about them. These also are not ment to wear without a bra if your a C cup or larger as some have mentioned. Unless you’re going for that look, then u need a bra!
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie PTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The best gifts are things that people never would have purchased for themselves
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend was wearing thick sports bras to hide her pokies but the bras were uncomfortable and they created sore spots and rashes on her skin. She never would have considered this kind of solution until I purchased several different kinds of covers for her to try. She tells me this one is the best by far. It's been about eighteen months and it's time to order more.
customer_reviews.author: ken holsten

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for Female runners
customer_reviews.text: My wife is an endurance runner and uses this product when running in the non-padded bra (and shirt). She finds this product very effective, comfortable during the run. She would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable enough to wear all day long for a wedding
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both these and the Hollywood fashion brand. When comparing the two, the differences I note are: These are a little thicker, no issues with seeing theough them, would be brave enough to wear with white. Because they are thicker, the edges do not lay quite as flat as Hollywood's, so you can see it wearing tight fitting or unlined clothes. The box these come with is much nicer for storage and travel. They stayed on all day during a wedding with a strapless dress. No issues with skin sensitivities or irritation. Overall, these seem to be more quality than Hollywood. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: One of them just does not stay on. Maybe tgese were used? Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: They stick really well!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome!! I am an eco tour guide and am in brackish water a lot. These stay on even in that! They keep things from showing and are so freaking comfortable I never want to wear a real bra anymore. They do their job well! I clean them instantly after taking them off and then place them on their molds after they are dry and so far they are in really good shape still. I will be buying more of these!!
customer_reviews.author: lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t sticks on after a while or few washes
customer_reviews.text: It was good when I first put it on, I purposely bought a this to stop my toddler from breastfeeding. After few days, she figured how to take it off. Just was disappointed after few washes it didn’t stick as much it kept falling off out of my nipple.
customer_reviews.author: LA LA

customer_reviews.title: So useful! Stayed on for 12 hours!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these!!! I bought them to wear with a dress that I couldn’t wear a bra with. Provided good coverage as intended and didn’t come off or peel away even after wearing for 12 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Emillz222010

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sticky boob option that covers everything. Order medium skin tone!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 36A and love going without bras. These Nippies are great because they taper off on the sides and basically cover the entire breast. The light ended up being too light for me, so I've since ordered another pair in the medium skin tone. I wouldn't recommend light unless you are very fair skinned. Make sure you keep up with cleaning them to maintain the stickiness! I didn't do the best job with that the first time around. Overall they are a great sticky boob option!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dawn Arbgast

customer_reviews.title: Great product lasts about a year
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review about to purchase my second pair. I find that they last about one year with regular care before the adhesive becomes too unreliable. I could probably extend the lift but I no longer wear any bras and cannot risk having one fall out while at work. This product has helped me gain confidence in myself and make the switch to 100% braless. I wear these to work but in the beginning I wore them all day. They can stay on while running and make it though a strenuous, sweaty hike. I find washing them every other day or so with water and soap helps them last.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Burkett

customer_reviews.title: These are so good!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO good. Way better than I could have imagined. If you are questioning if you should buy these, do it! They even lasted all day in 90 degree heat with 70% humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Music lover
